501(c)(3) Nonprofit Foundation

Your data should work for you ‚Äî not against you.

Every day, people generate health and lifestyle data that gets trapped in silos, exploited for profit, or simply lost. LLIF exists to change that ‚Äî giving individuals agency over their data while enabling better decisions at every scale, from personal health to global research.

Discover Programs ‚ÜíBuild on LLIF ‚ÜíResearch with LLIF ‚Üí
Why We Exist

We believe that individual data agency ‚Äî people owning and benefitting from their own data ‚Äî is the foundation for better learning and better decisions, from a single person to the entire world.

Today, a handful of companies profit enormously from data people generate but never truly own. Health insights stay locked in apps that don't talk to each other. Researchers struggle to access longitudinal data ethically. Organizations can't study population health without compromising individual privacy.

LLIF is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit that structurally solves this. When data is governed by a nonprofit ‚Äî classified as a donor-restricted asset, never sold, never exploited ‚Äî it becomes safe to build on. Safe for individuals to share. Safe for developers to innovate on. Safe for researchers to study. Safe for organizations to learn from.

Data agency for individuals. Better decisions at every scale. That's why LLIF exists.

Our Approach

People don't buy what you do. They buy why you do it.

Everything we build starts from a simple belief about data ownership ‚Äî and works outward.

Why

Individual Data Agency

People deserve to own, control, and benefit from their own data. When they do, better decisions happen ‚Äî for individuals, organizations, and the world. A nonprofit structure guarantees this alignment permanently.

How

Programs

Programs are how data agency becomes action. Organizers ‚Äî app developers, researchers, healthcare providers, employers ‚Äî create structured programs that participants subscribe to, collecting data on their terms while unlocking insights at every scale.

What

LLIF Cloud Platform

102 API endpoints. 620+ health taxonomy nodes. Multi-source data ingestion. Correlation analysis. Environmental enrichment. Compliance tracking. The infrastructure that makes programs possible.

Better Decisions at Every Scale

From Personal Insight to Global Impact

When individuals own their data and choose to participate, knowledge compounds ‚Äî from a single person managing their migraines to researchers understanding population health.

Who Builds With Us

Your vision, your users, our foundation.

LLIF is infrastructure ‚Äî not a competing product. When you build on a nonprofit foundation, you build on aligned incentives.

App Developers

Bring health and lifestyle apps to market faster with a complete data backend ‚Äî and offer your users Programs from a growing marketplace. Skip building infrastructure; start delivering value.

Build on LLIF ‚Ä∫

Research & Institutional

Design longitudinal studies as Programs. Participants collect data through apps they already use. You get ethical, compliant, consent-driven data ‚Äî and grant proposal support.

Research with LLIF ‚Ä∫

The future of health data is participant-owned.

Whether you're building an app, designing a study, or exploring what's possible ‚Äî we'd love to talk.
